short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Black Myth: Wukong Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Black Myth Wukong background. Black Myth Wukong wallpaper themes for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Cycle through Black Myth Wukong wallpapers each time you open a new tab.
2. Choose or randomize your Black Myth Wukong background from the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated Google search bar.
4. Direct links to your email and social media accounts.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. New Note feature to jot down your tasks.
7. Quick links to your most frequently visited websites.
8. Simplified access to your bookmarks.
9. Shortcut panel for adding and accessing favorite websites quickly.
10. Instant access to Google apps.
11. Direct link to More Themes.
12. Effortless sharing to social media platforms.
13. Instant downloads of wallpapers.
14. One-click access to online gaming.
15. Activate interactive animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your Black Myth Wukong new tab.
